page.title: 16Education
page.content: Independant Schools Meon Cross Independant School for Boys and Girls The school is situated mid way along Burnt House Lane. The school was opened in 1969 as a Preparatory School for girls with 21 pupils.It is at present a mixed school for 5 to 16 year olds.The junior departments are separate boys and girls schools.There is a present total role of 420 pupils. Hill Head Preparatory School It is situated on Crofton Lane. This is an independant day school for a small number of pupils from the age of 3 years.
